metadata.title: CVE-2020-27774 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw was found in ImageMagick in MagickCore/statistic.c. An attacker whosubmits a crafted file that is processed by ImageMagick could triggerundefined behavior in the form of a too large shift for 64-bit type`ssize_t`. This would most likely lead to an impact to applicationavailability, but could potentially cause other problems related toundefined behavior. This flaw affects ImageMagick versions prior to7.0.9-0.

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
